data.enText: to travel or go somewhere with sb

data.chText: 那次旅行他由妻子陪同。
data.enText: His wife accompanied him on the trip.
to happen or appear with sth else
strong winds accompanied by heavy rain

data.chText: 每包内装书一本，并附光盘一张。
data.enText: Each pack contains a book and accompanying CD.
to play a musical instrument, especially a piano, while sb else sings or plays the main tune

data.chText: 女歌手由她姐姐钢琴伴奏。
data.enText: The singer was accompanied on the piano by her sister.

simple_means.memory_skill: ac 表加强 + company 伙伴 → 陪伴

ex.enText: He accompanied her to the door.
The rain was accompanied by wind.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，多强调陪伴者与被陪伴者之间关系密切，也指某事物与另一事物同时发生或存在。

ex.enText: The king was attended by his courtiers.

ex.chText: 你有没有感觉到伴随这类事件的怪异气氛？
ex.enText: Do you have a sense of the peculiar atmosphere which attends such an event?

synonyms.bx: 多指下级、仆人陪伴上级、主人，也可以表示某事伴随另一事而发生。

ex.enText: The carrier was convoyed by four warships.

ex.chText: 战舰护卫着油轮驶过印度洋。
ex.enText: The warship convoyed the oil tanker through the Indian Ocean.

synonyms.bx: 指在保护下经由水路护送，其对象通常为物。

ex.enText: Who would like to escort her home?
The bodyguard escorted the boss home.

synonyms.bx: 指在保护下经由陆路护送，其对象通常为人。

example: The orchestra could barely follow the frequent pitch changes of the soprano
The nurse accompanied the old lady everywhere

tr: be present or associated with an event or entity
example: French fries come with the hamburger
heart attacks are accompanied by distruction of heart tissue
fish usually goes with white wine
this kind of vein accompanies certain arteries

value.def: If you accompany someone, you go somewhere with them.

example.ex: Ken agreed to accompany me on a trip to Africa...
example.tran: 肯答应陪我一起去非洲。

example.ex: She was accompanied by her younger brother...
The Prime Minister, accompanied by the governor, led the President up to the house.
example.tran: 首相在州长陪同下带领总统前往那座房子。

value.def: If one thing accompanies another, it happens or exists at the same time, or as a result of it.

example.ex: This volume of essays was designed to accompany an exhibition in Cologne...
example.tran: 这本文集是为配合在科隆举办的一场展览而出的。

example.ex: The proposal was instantly voted through with two to one in favour, accompanied by enthusiastic applause...
example.tran: 在热烈的掌声中，提案以2比1的优势很快通过了表决。

example.ex: Perhaps the accompanying illustration will explain it.
example.tran: 可能所附的图表能对此作出解释。

value.tran: 伴随；和…一起发生（或同时存在）

value.def: If you accompany a singer or a musician, you play one part of a piece of music while they sing or play the main tune.

example.ex: He sang and Alice accompanied him on the piano...
example.tran: 他一边唱，艾丽斯一边为他钢琴伴奏。

example.ex: We ended with Blake's Jerusalem, accompanied on the organ by Herbert Wiseman.
example.tran: 在赫伯特·怀斯曼的风琴伴奏下，我们演唱了布莱克的《耶路撒冷》作为终曲。

rootsaffixes.indicate: 等加在同辅音字母的词根前, 表加强
rootsaffixes.title: ab-, ac-, af-, ag-, ap-, ar-, as-, at-

partsOfSpeech.dec: ab 表加强 + brev 短 + iate 使… → 使一再变短 → 缩写
ac 表加强 + celer 速度 + ate 使… → 加快速度 → 加速
ac 表加强 + cent 唱歌 + uate 使… → 不停地唱 → 强调
ac 表加强 + company 伙伴 → 陪伴
ac 表加强 + cumul 堆积 + ate 做，造成，使… → 不断堆积 → 积累
af 表加强 + fili 子女 + ation 表结果 → 成为子女 → 入会
ag 表加强 + glomer 球状物 + ate 做，造成，使… → 成球状 → 成团
ag 表加强 + grand 大 + ize 使… → 一再大 → 扩大
ag 表加强 + grav 重 + ate 做，造成，使… →〔病〕加重 → 恶化
ag 表加强 + gress 行走 + ion 动作或状态 → 往前走 → 进攻
ap 表加强 + peas 平和 + e → 使〔人〕心态平和 → 抚慰
ap 表加强 + plaus 鼓掌 + e → 鼓掌
ap 表加强 + point 指 → 指定
ap 表加强 + preci 价值 + ate 做，造成，使… → 一再指出价值 → 欣赏
ar 表加强 + range 列 → 成列 → 安排
ar 表加强 + rest 休息 → 强制休息 → 逮捕
as 表加强 + sault 跳 → 跳起来〔争球〕→ 进攻
as 表加强 + sid 坐 + uous …的 → 一再坐着〔学习〕→ 勤奋的
as 表加强 + simil 一样 + ate 做，造成，使… → 成为相同 → 同化
as 表加强 + sist 站 → 站在一起 → 帮助
as 表加强 + soci 社会 + ate 做，造成，使… → 成为一个社会 → 联合
as 表加强 + sure 确定 → 一再确定 → 肯定
at 表加强 + tach 钉 → 牢牢钉上 → 附上
at 表加强 + tain 拿住 → 获得
at 表加强 + test 试验 → 一再试验 → 证实
at 表加强 + tract 拉 → 不断拉〔眼球〕→ 吸引
